name: Daniel
info: I am 22 years old now with more than 2 years of Angular experience behind my back.
As you go down, you will see all you need to know about me within minutes.
about: As I code - I want to enjoy it, so the tools must be awesome and I choose the best.
Hence - Angular was chosen among all the others as the most powerful, scalable and reliable framework.
As an experienced developer, I had a few big products to work on, of which you may find interesting to read below.

projects.title: FPK
description: FPK - a project designed to analyze the real-time movement of trains.

projects.title: GROM
description: GROM - an app to process tons of information on trains.

projects.title: SKKSP
description: SKKSP - an app to control the behavoir of AI computer vision.

projects.title: LIRA
description: LIRA - another app to keep track of documents.

projects.title: RZD Call Center
description: Call Center - a simple yet showcase app demonstrating my skills.

projects.title: Radon Engine
description: Radon Engine - an easy to use CV showcase engine.
